name: Median Split
definition: A median split divides a distribution into two equal parts, with 50% of the values falling below the median and 50% above it.

values.name: Below Median
values.definition: Quantile < 0.50. The lower half of the range of possible values.

values.name: Above Median
values.definition: 0.50 <= Quantile <= 1.0. The upper half of the range of possible values.
